summary: A 3-page interactive website to ask Chaitanya out on a date with a personal message and a playful 'No' button that moves away when hovered
architectural_notes: Multi-page structure: page 1 (landing/message), page 2 (question with Yes/No buttons), page 3 (response page)

existing_features.title: Create a landing page with the message 'Hey Chaitanya, this is me officially asking you' displayed prominently
Add a call-to-action asking Chaitanya to go on a date
Design a romantic, elegant visual theme with warm colors, sophisticated typography, and a layout that feels personal and heartfelt without being overly formal
Add a 'No' button that moves to a random position on the screen whenever the user hovers over it, preventing them from clicking it
Expand the website from a single page to a 3-page flow with creative navigation between pages

Design a creative multi-page flow: Page 1 as the initial invitation with the moving 'No' button, Page 2 as a persuasive intermediate page (triggered by multiple 'No' hover attempts or creative interaction), and Page 3 as the success/acceptance page (triggered by clicking 'Yes')

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website with a message asking Chaitanya out on a date
Add a playful 'No' button that moves away when user hovers over it
Expand website to 3 pages with creative flow
